welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Loudoun Valley Estates! Get ready to experience the charming beauty of our city, known for its rolling hills, picturesque vineyards, and friendly community. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Loudoun Valley Estates has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Washington Dulles International Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Washington Dulles International Airport primarily serves United Airlines and its Star Alliance partners.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Washington Dulles International Airport serves a variety of domestic and international airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C at Washington Dulles International Airport serves primarily international flights and is connected to the main terminal by an underground train.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require reconnection in certain areas.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Montgomery County Airport handles all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Montgomery County Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The oldest and smallest terminal at DCA, serving primarily regional flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B/C
terminals.description: The main terminal at DCA, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal D
terminals.description: A newer terminal at DCA, primarily serving American Airlines flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require periodic reconnection.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Warrenton-Fauquier Airport offers all necessary amenities for travelers, including check-in counters, baggage claim, and a small selection of shops and restaurants.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Warrenton-Fauquier Airport caters to private and charter flights, offering a more exclusive and luxurious experience for travelers.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Frederick Municipal Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Frederick Municipal Airport is used exclusively for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
